name: Tail Me (Wendy Shadowsun, 3P0D ON/OFF, W REX, lesouhail, Jojo Glatu)
name_original: Tail Me (Wendy Shadowsun, 3P0D ON/OFF, W REX, lesouhail, Jojo Glatu)
description:
Tail Me (Wendy Shadowsun, 3P0D ON/OFF, W REX, lesouhail, Jojo Glatu) is a simulation game developed by Wendy Shadowsun, 3P0D ON/OFF, W REX and lesouhail. It came out on 07-10-2018.
You can play Tail Me (Wendy Shadowsun, 3P0D ON/OFF, W REX, lesouhail, Jojo Glatu) on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
